Darkness of Man is an upcoming American action-thriller film written, directed and co-produced by James Cullen Bressack. It stars Jean-Claude Van Damme, Kristanna Loken, Emerson Min, Spencer Breslin, Sticky Fingaz, and Shannen Doherty.
The film is scheduled to be released on VOD on May 21, 2024.


Cast[edit]
Jean-Claude Van Damme as Russell Hatch
Kristanna Loken as Claire
Emerson Min as Jayden
Spencer Breslin as Chris
Sticky Fingaz as Yates
Shannen Doherty as Vivian
Production[edit]
In November 2022, it was announced that an action-thriller film titled Darkness of Man was in development, with James Cullen Bressack directing, co-producing and co-writing the screenplay. Jean-Claude Van Damme was cast in the lead role as Russell Hatch.[1] In February 2023, Saban Films acquired the distribution rights to the film.[2]
In March 2024, with the release of the official trailer, it was revealed that Kristanna Loken, Emerson Min, Spencer Breslin, Sticky Fingaz, and Shannen Doherty had joined the cast.[3]

Release[edit]
Darkness of Man is scheduled to be released on VOD on May 21, 2024.[3]

References[edit]


^ Ritman, Alex (November 1, 2022). "Jean-Claude Van Damme to Lead Neo-Noir L.A. Action Film 'Darkness of Man' (Exclusive)". The Hollywood Reporter. Retrieved March 25, 2024.

^ Ravindran, Manori (February 15, 2023). "Jean-Claude Van Damme's 'Darkness of Mans' Sells to Saban Films (EXCLUSIVE)". Variety. Retrieved March 25, 2024.

^ a b Squires, John (March 25, 2024). "'Darkness of Man' Trailer – Jean Claude Van Damme Is Back in Rated "R" Action Thriller". Bloody Disgusting. Retrieved March 25, 2024.
